title: Ananya Kapoor - Designer Portfolio
description: A modern single-page portfolio with smooth GSAP animations, and minimalist black design built with React and Tailwind CSS.
clientBrief: Independent designer Ananya Kapoor needs a striking portfolio to attract modern businesses seeking brand strategy and thoughtful design. Target audience: startups and SMBs. Required: hero section, portfolio gallery, contact information. Dark minimalist aesthetic with smooth animations. Deliverable: responsive single-page website communicating personal, purposeful, and powerful visual voice.
caseStudy: Created a single-page portfolio demonstrating design expertise through implementation. Features animated gradient orbs, GSAP ScrollTrigger effects, and custom carousel. Solved the challenge of standing out professionally while showcasing creativity. Result: immersive, fast-loading experience reflecting modern design principles with seamless mobile responsiveness.
